message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_FV_TYPE_EXISTS
message.locale: An Approval Check already exists for this type of service plan group.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_FV_SELECT_EITHER_APPLIES_TO_ALL_OR_ACTIVE_TYPE
message.locale: This approval check is already active.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_FV_PERCENTAGE_NOT_IN_RANGE
message.locale: Percentage value should not be less than 0 and not more than 100.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_FV_TYPE_ACTIVE
message.locale: This approval check is already active.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_XFV_SELECT_SERVICEPLAN
message.locale: Service plan group name must be specified if applies to all service plan groups has not been selected.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_XFV_SELECT_APPLIESTOALLIND
message.locale: As this approval check applies to all service plan groups you must not select an individual service plan group name.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLANGROUP_RV_CANCELLED_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: Approval check cannot be modified as the service plan group is canceled.
Approval check cannot be modified as the service plan group is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_XRV_SERVICEPLANGROUP_CANCELED
message.locale: This service plan group has already been cancelled. An approval check cannot be created or modified for a cancelled service plan group.
This service plan group has already been canceled. An approval check cannot be created or modified for a canceled service plan group.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_FV_CANCELED
message.locale: Service plan group approval check is already cancelled.
Service plan group approval check is already canceled.

message.name: ERR_APPROVALCHECK_RV_CANCELED_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: Approval Check cannot be modified as it is cancelled.
Approval Check cannot be modified as it is canceled.
